answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Good to see you are doing well. Along with the diet ensure to control other co morbid conditions like diabetes and hypertension. Also, be cautious with contacting any infections. And Good Luck!Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: Just thought I would share. I just got back from my nephrologist and my GFR went from 65 to 73! I am so excited. So in the space of a year and a few months, being on the kidney diet, it has gone from GFR 54 to GFR 73. So if your doctor gives you a diet to follow - listen to them! I will probably need to be on the diet my whole life otherwise my GFR will drop again, but compared to kidney failure a diet change is no biggy!
title: Great News
